title: For all have sinned
lineItems: "For all have sinned and fallen short of the glory of God"  -- Romans 3:23 (NIV)
What does this say to you?
comments:
Tip: Why did I have my friend read it out loud?  Because faith comes from hearing.

When people read Scripture aloud, you will be suprised how quickly they become convinced of their need to trust Jesus as Lord and Saviour.

Watch God work as you continue to guide others to read these Scriptures.  You are looking for an answer like: "Everyone has sinned"
